meanings.definition: A stone used as a hammer for shaping or breaking other stones.
meanings.sent1: The ancient people used hammerstones to shape tools from rocks.
meanings.sent2: He found a collection of hammerstones in the archaeological site.
meanings.sent3: The hammerstones had a meeting to discuss their next rock-breaking competition.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a relentless hammerstone, shaping her future.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the hammerstones hitting the rocks echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: The act of using a hammerstone to strike another object.
meanings.sent1: The hammerstones on the anvil created a rhythmic beat.
meanings.sent2: The demonstration involved the proper technique of using hammerstones.
meanings.sent3: The hammerstones decided to go on strike until they got better working conditions.
meanings.sent4: His words were like hammerstones, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies.
meanings.sent5: The force of the hammerstones hitting the metal was impressive.
